entities.name: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
entities.description: The Chief Executive Officer is considered to be the chief operating decision maker (CODM) in the company, responsible for reviewing financial information on an operating segment basis for decision making and assessing financial performance.

entities.name: GEFORCE GPUS
entities.description: GeForce GPUs are part of the company's Graphics segment, used for gaming and PCs.

entities.name: GEFORCE NOW
entities.description: GeForce NOW is a game streaming service and related infrastructure under the company's Graphics segment.

entities.name: QUADRO/NVIDIA RTX GPUS
entities.description: Quadro/NVIDIA RTX GPUs are used for enterprise workstation graphics and are part of the company's Graphics segment.

entities.name: VGPU SOFTWARE
entities.description: vGPU software is used for cloud-based visual and virtual computing and is included in the company's Graphics segment.

entities.name: OMNIVERSE SOFTWARE
entities.description: Omniverse software is used for building 3D designs and virtual worlds and is part of the company's Graphics segment.

entities.name: MELLANOX
entities.description: Mellanox provides networking and interconnect solutions and is part of the company's Compute & Networking segment.

entities.name: JETSON
entities.description: Jetson is used for robotics and other embedded platforms and is part of the company's Compute & Networking segment.

entities.name: NVIDIA AL ENTERPRISE
entities.description: NVIDIA Al Enterprise is a software included in the company's Compute & Networking segment.

entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION AND SUBSIDIARIES
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation and its subsidiaries are the entities for which the consolidated financial statements are prepared.

relationships.relationship_description: The Chief Executive Officer is the CODM responsible for reviewing financial information and making decisions for NVIDIA Corporation and its subsidiaries.
